title: Can you give me one PBE account please.

replies.body: I was able to confirm that your application was received; however, we're unable to expedite acceptance into the PBE.  We have a [PBE guide](http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pbe-faq) which provides additional information as well as steps for updating your contact email.  Hope that helps, and best of luck!
i wish i could give you mine. i hated the pbe
